Articles.Content:
I've been a big fan of KSP for some time, and I've been watching a few of the video streams from some of the other community members, and I figured it was about time I started my own.

My stream will be recorded live on Twitch, with the highlights posted on YouTube. My first recording session was yesterday, and the highlights were split into two episodes for YouTube.

I had a few technical issues with sound levels on this first shooting... hopefully I'll get that fixed up before round two so you guys can hear me a bit better.

I was quite amazed that during live recording I managed a "first-try" launch into orbit after unlocking just the first node in the tech tree... see the launch and the ship in Episode 2.

Subscribe on Twitch for notification when I next go live: http://www.twitch.tv/ellbristow

Watch the highlights, and subscribe, on YouTube:

I hope you enjoy the series and I'm excited to see where we can take it. Feel free to make suggestions on where you want the series to go and what you think of the videos

I'll keep you updated here as things progress!

I'm interested to know what other streamers are doing for 0.23. Are you planning to reset your career mode games to the beginning or are you hoping to pick up where you left off? I'm can't decide what to do myself.

I'm planning an impromptu live stream tonight to do a "first look" play through with the 0.23 update. Feel free to drop by! Subscribe at http://www.twitch.tv/ellbristow to get a notification when I go live.

If you miss it, don't forget to catch up on my YouTube channel at
